channel.title: Garage Band by Adam Alexander
channel.managingEditor: garageband@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Garage Band | Solid Gold Audiobook Studios)
channel.copyright: © Solid Gold Audiobook Studios - all rights reserved
channel.description:
After helping to build the Eastland Insurance company for 17 years, Lanthus Trilby is retrenched without warning, to make way for “younger, brighter” minds. Angry and betrayed, the passive actuary wants to let his boss feel his rage.

His initial plans of keying his boss’ car escalate beyond merely blowing it up. Lanthus is going to take down the entire company. But his plan needs a team with special skills. The hacker, the daredevil, the explosives expert and the acrobatic pair join Lanthus to pull off the most daring caper the world has ever seen to bring Eastland Insurance to its knees.

But as soon as than the plan begins, trouble sets in. The police are closing in, and someone else wants a piece of the action.

Can Lanthus keep it together long enough to pull off his master plan?

p>

another Solid Gold audiobook
channel.itunes:subtitle: A comedy that has Nothing to do with Music. Everything to do with Getting Even.

Lanthus is going to take down the entire company. But his plan needs a team with special skills. The hacker, the daredevil, the explosives expert and the acrobatic pair join Lanthus to pull off the most daring caper the world has ever seen to bring Eastland Insurance to its knees. item.itunes:author: Adam Alexander | Solid Gold Audiobook Studios
item.title: Chapter 1 | Surrounded
item.itunes:subtitle: Surrounded
item.description:
Chapter 1 | Surrounded | After helping to build the Eastland Insurance company for 17 years, Lanthus Trilby is retrenched without warning, to make way for “younger, brighter” minds. Angry and betrayed, the passive actuary wants to let his boss feel his rage. His initial plans of keying his boss’ car escalate beyond merely blowing it up. Lanthus is going to take down the entire company. But his plan needs a team with special skills.

The hacker, the daredevil, the explosives expert and the acrobatic pair join Lanthus to pull off the most daring caper the world has ever seen to bring Eastland Insurance to its knees.

But as soon as than the plan begins, trouble sets in. The police are closing in, and someone else wants a piece of the action. Can Lanthus keep it together long enough to pull off his master plan?

“witty, often sarcastic and even heart warming…Lanthus’ dialogue had me in stitches”- The Blityering Bibliomaniacs

“Adam Alexander deserves the applause readers will give Garage Band.”- Readers' Favorite

Now we’re talking! Witty and amusing ... a thundering good caper filled with crime and good fun.” - Books and Everything

For more information about this book and the author, visit SolidGoldStudios.co.za/garageband

If you liked the first 3 chapters, you can buy the full audiobook on Audible. Enjoy!
